title: Cuckoo-spit (Froghoppers)
creator_credit: Associated British-Pathe and British Instructional Films
brief_description: An account of the life cycle of the froghopper showing all the stages of growth from the laying of eggs in the autumn through to the final change and emergence from the skin which takes place within the bubbles formation.
description: An account of the life cycle of the froghopper showing all the stages of growth from the laying of eggs in the autumn through to the final change and emergence from the skin which takes place within the bubbles formation.
